statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_display=$(printf '\033[2m%s\033[0m' "$cwd"); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then repo=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null | xargs basename); branch=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); staged=""; unstaged=""; if ! git -C "$cwd" diff --quiet --cached 2>/dev/null; then staged="+"; fi; if ! git -C "$cwd" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null; then unstaged="!"; fi; git_info=$(printf ' \033[2m%s (%s%s%s)\033[0m' "$repo" "$branch" "$unstaged" "$staged"); fi; echo "${dir_display}${git_info}"
